text: Michael Solomon Martin (born 1938) is a former Canadian politician. He represented the electoral district of Labrador South in the Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly from 1972 to 1975. He was a member of the New Labrador Party.Encyclopedia of Newfoundland and Labrador He was born at Cartwright. Martin served in the Canadian Armed Forces where he served four missions as a United Nations peacekeeper. Martin is known for designing the unofficial Flag of Labrador in 1974. He also designed the Labrador Tartan. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:People from Labrador Category:Members of the Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly Category:Labrador Party politicians
title: Michael S. Martin
